body:
Day 10 - Manga 245*
The art was pretty bad and the censorship made it even worse. I came to see hentai, not pixels.
3/10.
Still don't like rape and felt like a book of nothing 3/10
2 rape doujins in a row hmm, anyways it was actually good 6/10
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga
